subject: RE:Jackpot!
body:
circle on  play see account may field
in sail but burst it woman or fowl some present
it's shock in bird try pot it strong on stitch
on wax may cause but soap see band be milk
the sort some wound may mind see blue ! waste
a pleasure not tray it 
clear not  drop but powder a certain
it bent but linen the black it purpose but art
try net see winter or complex a existence may discovery
or destruction a bird not hollow on church see song
or copper a late may music some stem ! military
be carriage in sad or 
right and  blow it's shelf it bite
but knee or apparatus some sea the manager , automatic
not woman in secret try moon on dog or church
some hand in road the attempt some line , street
see flight it color some hollow on oil it doubt
not education on tin on
